data.name: Movavi Photo Editor 5
data.detailed_description:
With Movavi Photo Editor, you can easily enhance any image, whether it is a photo from a recent holiday or a banner for your website. The intuitive interface and simple yet powerful tools will help you perfect your photo collection.

No more unwanted details

Some random person wandered into your picture? Or ugly electric wires have invaded a beautiful landscape? Say no more! With Movavi’s smart algorithm, you can remove any unwanted object from your photos. You just need to select it with one of the handy dedicated tools – the program will do the rest.

Eye-candy portraits

Make your portrait photos flawless with the advanced retouching tools: remove skin shine, wrinkles, and other blemishes, whiten teeth, reshape faces and figures, enlarge eyes, even apply make-up!

Colors that pop

The colors in your pictures can really pop if you adjust them just a little. You can use the Magic Enhance tool that automatically improves the photo’s contrast and brightness, or tweak these and other settings by hand: saturation, exposure, highlights, shadows, sharpness, and more.

Background editing

Change the backdrop of your photos in 3 simple steps: select the foreground, refine the edges, then set the new background. How about teleporting yourself to any corner of the world or creating a unique header for your online profile?

Preserving memories

Old photos hold precious memories, so rescuing them will not only give you back the pictures, but you’ll also have the opportunity to save the family’s photo history. Thanks to Movavi’s artificial neural networks, your antique images can be enhanced with just a click – no more scratches and stains.

More editing tools

  • Apply stylish color filters to quickly enhance a photo
  • Remove visual noise from pictures taken in low light
  • Overlay multiple captions
  • Insert images and create collages
  • Crop, rotate, and resize photos

Any graphics format

The program supports all the popular image formats: JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, PBM, PCX, DPX, RAW formats, and more. So you can edit pretty much any photo you have.

data.short_description: Remove unwanted objects, touch up portraits, adjust colors, replace backgrounds, restore old photos, and more – Movavi Photo Editor has all the tools you need to enhance images and preserve precious memories forever.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista/7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8, Intel® HD Graphics 2000, AMD Radeon™ R600 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
